about_the_game:
Almost everything that's in the game is in the game for a specific reason, in this small booklet I explain my reasoning behind almost everything.

The booklet comes as a .pdf file. You can locate it in the DLC folder in the main game's directory, which can be found by right clicking the game in the library and pressing "Browse local files" within the "manage" section.

This should be seen as a way to support me as a developer.

*NOTE: This booklet has spoilers for "LIFE" not found;

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC touches topics such as: Porn, Suicide & Self Harm.
